programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Most Toys
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 170 When transporting a dangerous material to the Enterprise, Data is kidnapped and the crew is led to believe he is dead when the shuttlecraft he was piloting explodes enroute.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Sarek
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 171 Legendary Federation ambassador Sarek visits the Enterprise to conclude peace talks with a race called the Legarans.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Menage a Troi
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 172 When Deanna's mother spurns advances made by a Ferengi Daimon, he takes it upon himself to kidnap the two of them, along with Commander Riker and steal them away aboard his ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Transfigurations
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 173 The Enterprise finds a deserted planet where a ship has crashed, and, with it, the lone survivor with no memory, but extraordinary healing powers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Best of Both Worlds (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 174 Responding to a distress call on one of the Federation's outer-most colonies, the Enterprise arrives...only to find a big hole in the ground where the town used to be, and discovers the Borg are behind the attack.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Best of Both Worlds (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 175 Commander Riker had no choice as acting captain but fire full force on the Borg starship, despite Picard being on board of it, altered to a Borg calling himself Locutus, both ships are damaged.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Family
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 178 After defeating the Borg, the crew of the Enterprise experiences shore leave in various ways. Captain Picard's return to his family's vineyard in France has some extraordinary repercussions following his time spent as a member of the Borg collective.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Brothers
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 177 After an accident aboard the Enterprise leaves one of its children in grave danger, Data commandeers the Enterprise, driven to take him to an unknown origin, where an interesting figures awaits.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Suddenly Human
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 176 On a rescue mission to an alien shipwrecked training mission, they discover one of its trainees to be a human.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Remember Me
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 179 Dr. Crusher's fear of losing loved ones becomes real when her worries create an alternate reality.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Legacy
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Reunion
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 181 When the head of the Klingon high council passes on, Picard finds himself in the middle of the struggle for the now-vacant position. Meanwhile, Worf re-unites with a past love, only to find he now has a son.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Future Imperfect
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 182 Riker has to quit his birthday party during a so-far uneventful patrol voyage at the Neutral Zone to head an away team when a Romulan secret base is found on a planet which was believed uninhabited.

programme.title: Automata - Automata
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jacq Vaucan (Antonio Banderas, 'The Mask of Zorro') is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves.

programme.title: Android Cop - Android Cop
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness.

programme.title: Metamorphosis - Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When his experiments in genetics are mocked by his colleagues, maverick scientist Dr. Peter Houseman takes extreme measures to prove that his untested anti-aging serum works.

programme.title: Singularity Principle - Singularity Principle (2014)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Singularity Principle is a feature length science-fiction film about the consequences of renegade experiments into Parallel Universes.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 19 Are MacLeod and the police seeing a ghost when evidence in a diamond theft and poison gas murder points to evil, but dead, Xavier St. Cloud?

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Till Death
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 After 300 years, Gina and Robert de Valicourt's marriage is on the rocks.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Judgment Day
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 21 Dawson's life is on the line when the Watchers try him on the charge of treason for his friendship with MacLeod.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Whole Truth
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 A used car salesman buys a car that dooms him to tell only the truth.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Invaders
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 When a woman investigates a clamor on the roof of her rural house, she discovers a small UFO and little aliens emerging from it. Or so it seems.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Penny For Your Thoughts
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 Gaining telepathic abilities when his coin lands on its edge bank clerk Hector B. Poole learns about the difference between other people's plans and fantasies.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Twenty-Two
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 While in the hospital recovering from overwork, Liz Powell keeps dreaming about going down to the hospital morgue.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Odyssey of Flight 33
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 Passing through the sound barrier a commercial airliner inadvertently travels back in time.

programme.title: Pluto TV Sci-Fi - Pluto TV Sci-Fi
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Nightwatch - In the Blink of an Eye
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 Swat officers J. and Alley come face-to-face with the violence in the city after a high-speed chase turns into a shootout with their suspect.

programme.title: Nightwatch - Fallen Brother
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 The city is in mourning after a well-loved Police officer is shot and killed on duty. Vic and P chase a suspect following an altercation with another officer.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Mardi Gras
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Mardi Gras is the biggest party of the year in Southern Louisiana, and it doesn't just happen in New Orleans. Terrebonne Parish is home to the second biggest Mardi Gras in the state.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Hunt for the Swamp Monster
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 The local shrimpers in Terrebonne Parish are notorious for handling their own problems and don't like interference from the cops.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Geaux Speed Racers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 Terrebonne Parish can be a tough place for teenagers to find weekend entertainment, so deputies will investigate all sorts of calls involving the bayou's most troublesome kids.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - The Great Swamp Escape
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 In Terrebonne Parish, the shrimping season is about to get underway as fishermen are getting their trawl boats ready and stretching out their nets.

programme.title: Nightwatch - 100%, Every Time
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Randy and Justin chase down a suspected car thief, while both EMT teams respond to emergency calls involving children in distress.

programme.title: Nightwatch - When Work Becomes Family
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 It's New Year's in New Orleans and gun violence is rampant as Police and EMS deal with armed robberies and shootings. Plus, EMT Gavin returns to the job, and everyone celebrates a new addition to the family.

programme.title: Nightwatch - In the Blink of an Eye
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 Swat officers J. and Alley come face-to-face with the violence in the city after a high-speed chase turns into a shootout with their suspect.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Hunt for the Swamp Monster
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 The local shrimpers in Terrebonne Parish are notorious for handling their own problems and don't like interference from the cops.

programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Randy and Justin chase down a suspected car thief, while both EMT teams respond to emergency calls involving children in distress.

programme.title: Nightwatch - When Work Becomes Family
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 It's New Year's in New Orleans and gun violence is rampant as Police and EMS deal with armed robberies and shootings. Plus, EMT Gavin returns to the job, and everyone celebrates a new addition to the family.

programme.title: Nightwatch - In the Blink of an Eye
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 Swat officers J. and Alley come face-to-face with the violence in the city after a high-speed chase turns into a shootout with their suspect.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Burning Rage
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 In Birmingham, AL, a woman, her son and her young niece are stabbed more than 75 times then set on fire inside their apartment. Investigators zero in on the victims' relative.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Spoiled, Rotten, & Ruthless
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 70 A look at three members of an affluent family who are mowed down inside their home.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Poughkeepsie Predator
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 71 A look at a serial killer in upstate New York.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Grim Sleeper
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 72 A killer terrorizes South Los Angeles during the 1980's, then goes dormant for 14 years only to resurface.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Dreaming of Murder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 73 A woman's dream leads cops in coastal Florida to the body of a dead woman hidden in the bushes on a beach.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Dischord
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 36 At the Paris Opera House, an infatuated stagehand takes on the murderous role of the villain.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Snake Charmer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 37 A Texas rodeo star is devastated when he comes home to find his beauty-queen wife dead with multiple rattlesnake bites on her feet.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Mistaken Identity
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A man hires a killer to bump off his wife, but instead, he kills another woman with the exact same name.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Future Crime
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Can the sound of a suspect’s voice reveal his lie? Can the crucial moment of a crime be revealed? Can computers isolate a guilty face in a crowd? No longer science fiction, these are the high-tech tools of the forensics trade.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - The Cover-Up
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 Fire, water, and earth – killers call on all the elements in their attempt to cover up their crimes. But even a body burned to ashes, sunk deep into the sea, or reduced to fragments will still tell its forensic tale.

programme.title: I Lived with a Killer - Sammy Gravano
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 Sammy "The Bull" Gravano's testimony against the Mafia affected the life of his daughter, Karen.

programme.title: I Lived with a Killer - Classified Ad Rapist
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Cynthia Bartlett is married for six years to serial killer and rapist Bobby Joe Long.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 5
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A night shift depends into chaos for the cops, one officer is hit with racial abuse, and a member of the public destroys potential evidence.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 6
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 A woman has a very bad hair day, a man is talking tough to the cops, and a police dog gets to sink his teeth into suspected, hidden criminals.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Bobby Joe Long
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 Bobby Joe Long is an American serial killer and rapist who terrorised the Tampa Bay Area in Florida during 1984. During his eight-month sadistic killing spree, he murdered ten women.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Robert Berdella - KCB
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 Robert Berdella was an American serial killer, known as The Kansas City Butcher, who was responsible for drugging, raping, torturing and murdering six young men.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Let He Who Is Without Sin...
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 7 While vacationing on the planet Risa, Worf falls under the influence of a traditionalist group bent on destroying the pleasure paradise.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Things Past
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 8 Sisko, Odo, Dax, and Garak are mysteriously placed into the roles of a group of condemned Bajorans executed seven years ago.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Ascent
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 Stranded on a desolate planet, longtime adversaries Odo and Quark must rely on each other to survive.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Rapture
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 Sisko is plagued by life-threatening visions that may hold the key to Bajor's future.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Darkness And The Light
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 A mysterious assassin targets the members of Kira's resistance cell for execution.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Begotten
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 12 While Kira gives birth, Odo raises an infant, Changeling.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - For The Uniform
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 13 Sisko risks everything to capture a former crewmember who deceived him and joined the Maquis.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - In Purgatory's Shadow
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 14 While Worf and Garak are imprisoned in the Gamma Quadrant, Sisko learns of a Dominion invasion.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - By Inferno's Light
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 15 Led by Gul Dukat, Cardassia joins the Dominion and prepares to take over the Alpha Quadrant.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Doctor Bashir, I Presume
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 16 When Bashir is chosen as the model for Starfleet's holographic doctor program, the process threatens to expose a dark secret from his past.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - A Simple Investigation
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 17 Odo falls in love with a mysterious woman who has been targeted for murder.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Business As Usual
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 18 Quark accepts a position working for an arms dealer to erase his debts.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Ties Of Blood And Water
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 19 The imminent death of Kira's Cardassian "father" rekindles painful memories of losing her real father.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 2 The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.
